      • unlock

        public final void unlock()
        从接口复制的说明: SimpleLock
        Unlocks the lock. Once you unlock it, you should not use for any other operation.
        指定者:
        unlock 在接口中 SimpleLock

      • doUnlock

        protected abstract void doUnlock()

      • extend

        public Optional<SimpleLock> extend(java.time.Duration lockAtMostFor,
                                   java.time.Duration lockAtLeastFor)
        从接口复制的说明: SimpleLock
        Extends the lock. If the lock can be extended a new lock is returned. After calling extend, no other operation can be called on current lock.

        This method is NOT supported by all lock providers.

        指定者:
        extend 在接口中 SimpleLock
        参数:
        lockAtMostFor - most
        lockAtLeastFor - least
        返回:
        a new lock or empty optional if the lock can not be extended

      • doExtend

        protected Optional<SimpleLock> doExtend(LockConfiguration newConfiguration)
